metadata.title: Update uptime-kuma repository to use custom stack file
metadata.description: Changes uptime-kuma template to use custom stack file (Stack/uptimekuma.yml) from bauerpawel/Portainer_templates_v3_converter repository instead of default xneo1 repository. Includes maintainer URL update.
metadata.author: bauerpawel

operations.description: Update uptime-kuma template to use custom repository and stack file
